thread.title: Mansion Group is Delighted to Announce New Partnership with Crystal Palace Football Club as its new Official Main Sponsor
thread.title_full: Mansion Group is Delighted to Announce New Partnership with Crystal Palace Football Club as its new Official Main Sponsor

title: Mansion Group is Delighted to Announce New Partnership with Crystal Palace Football Club as its new Official Main Sponsor
text:
Download image 
GIBRALTAR , July 13,   
Global online gaming business, Mansion Group, has been confirmed as the Official Main Sponsor of Crystal Palace FC in a move that will see them working closely with the Premier League team across a broad spectrum of commercial activities. 
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150713/235591 ) 
The partnership will enable the proactive development and expansion of both brands, alongside a range of mutually beneficial projects and marketing endeavours. 
Sagi Lahav , CEO of Mansion Group, said: 
"As a global business with the utmost respect for the English Premier league, we are thrilled with this exciting partnership. At Mansion we are proud to be working with a team whose hard work and determination has seen them secure their place in the Premier League for a third consecutive season. 
"We look forward to working together with Crystal Palace on a number of initiatives that will enhance the visibility of both of our brands, whilst providing a platform for CPFC fans, and our Mansion casino members, to benefit from the partnership." 
Steve Parish , Chairman at Crystal Palace , said: 
"At Crystal Palace FC we are pleased to be working alongside such an entertainment heavyweight as Mansion. I very much look forward to partnering with them to grow both our distinct brands. 
"We have an exciting season ahead of us, as we seek to truly establish ourselves in the Barclays Premier League, and I'm excited that Mansion will be joining us as we continue to create a new reality and future for our Club." 
Launched in 2004, the Mansion Group has firmly established itself as a leading provider of online gambling and entertainment. With more than 10 years experience in the gaming industry, the group enjoys an international player base and strong market share. Operating under the strapline, 'Where the World Plays', Mansion boasts a broad portfolio of popular online casinos catering to all tastes, of which Casino.com is the flagship. 
The partnership was negotiated by sports marketing agency SportQuake, who specialise in creating and delivering world-leading two-way partnerships for rights-owners and brands. 
SOURCE Mansion Group
